First-lien covered transactions extended in 2015 that are secured by these properties can be counted as rural or underserved in your determination of whether more than 50 percent of your first-lien covered transactions in 2015 are secured by properties located in rural or underserved areas. If your institution meets this more than 50 percent test based on your 2015 loans, you meet the requirement of operating predominantly in rural or underserved areas for purposes of 2016 and for loan applications received before April 1, 2017.
